5.  Some MP3 players are of such high quality that it is sometimes impossible
to distinguish the sound of the MP3 player from the sound of a live
human voice. Would the Turing test show that such MP3 players can sing?
Why or why not?
*“Strong” to distinguish the position from “weak” or “cautious” AI, which holds that the
computer is simply a very useful tool in the study of the mind, not that the appropriately
